Rulings.Edison:
●Returning the Synchro Monster to the Extra Deck is a cost.
●You target the Tuner monster●If the Level of the Synchro Monster you returned was being modified, you refer to the modified Level in choosing targets.
Rulings.Tengu:
●Returning the Synchro Monster to the Extra Deck is a cost.
●You target the Tuner monster(s) you wish to Summon.If one of the targets is no longer in the GY, you still Special Summon the rest of them.
●If the Level of the Synchro Monster you returned was being modified, you refer to the modified Level in choosing targets.

Rulings.Base:
1. Returning the Synchro Monster to the Extra Deck is a cost.
2. You target the Tuner monster(s) you wish to Summon.
3. If one of the targets is no longer in the GY, you still Special Summon the rest of them.
4. If the Level of the Synchro Monster you returned was being modified, you refer to the modified Level in choosing targets.

PSCT.Base: Return 1 face-up Synchro Monster you control to the Extra Deck to select and Special Summon a Tuner monster(s) from your Graveyard, whose total Levels equal the Level of that Synchro Monster. You cannot Synchro Summon the turn you activate this card.
